flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
I would like to present you my product, Baxaver (the Back-Saver), is a portable telescopic backrest fit for resting the back when standing in the upright position (a very common situation and, up to now, without a solution).

The device is useful for many people – from orthopedics to tourism, from different situations of wait (for example queueing at museums or public offices) to the participation to events (for example, during concerts), on various professional occasions (housevives/ironers, musicians, surgeons, traffic police, bartenders, mechanics, fishermen, farmers...etc.).

Baxaver won Silver Medal at the 39th International Exhibition of Inventions of Geneva 6th-10th April 2011.

www.baxaver.com
